page.title: 18Shops In Moulton
page.content: Some shops and services have remained since 1905. They include: the newsagent, the Lion Hotel and Public House, post office and butcher. Some shops and services have changed this century they include Wilson's shoe shop, the coal merchant, Buckley's cakery, drapery, crockery and grocery store, Darlington's bakehouse, Bootmaker, cycle agent, tailor, grocery, milliner, Beresford's confectioners and Beresford's cottage grocery. In Moulton today there are fewer shops which include the Co_op, Post Office, Newsagents, Greengrocer, DIY, Whally's General Store, Moulton Store and Harrinson's clothes shop. There is no longer a tailor but there is a clothing factory which makes clothes and sells to shops.
